Stoneskin (D4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr

Sunburst (D8 Evoc): R150' 60' radius inflicts 12d6 HP and blindness (save Constitution half HP only; an additional save each turn ends blindness) for 1 min

Transport Via Plants (D6 Conj): R10' Allows creatures to teleport from a large plant target to another for 1 rd
Tree Stride (D5 Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
True Resurrection (D9 Necr): Restores life and full hit points to and removes all diseases, poisons, wounds, and curses from a willing touched or named 200-year-old corpse
Tsunami (D8 Conj): 300'x300'x50' wall of water within sight inflicts 6d10 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half); it moves away 50' per rd, reducing its height by 50' and its damage by 1d10 HP each rd, for concentration up to 6 rd
Wall Of Fire (D4 Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Stone (D5 Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Stone (D5 [Circle Of The Land (Desert)] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10'x6" or 10'x20'x3" panels for concentration up to 10 min
Wall Of Thorns (D6 Conj): R120' Creates a 60'x10'x5' wall or a 20'x20'x5' ring that inflicts 7d8 HP piercing (save Dexterity half) initially, plus half Speed and 7d8 HP slashing to creatures passing through (save Dexterity half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Water Breathing (D3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 24 hr [R]
Water Walk (D3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can traverse liquids for 1 hr [R]
Wind Walk (D6 Tran): R30' Self and 10 others can become gaseous, gaining a 300' per rd fly Speed and resistance to nonmagical weapons, at will for 8 hr; converting to or from gas requires 1 min of incapacitation
Wind Wall (D3 Evoc): R120' Creates a 50'x15'x1' area that inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Bonus Cantrip (Circle Of The Land): Knows an additional Druid cantrip
Circle Spells: Has access to terrain-specific spells
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Natural Recovery: Can recover 5 spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the druid spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 1 creature for 5 hr 2 times per short rest
